item.title: ‘Omicron, variants dominant in India’
item.description: ‘Omicron, variants dominant in India’ BA.2 and its descendent lineages have been found over the last week in different parts of India

item.title: Why we enjoy fear: the science of a good scare
item.description: Why we enjoy fear: the science of a good scare The thrill of a frightening film can feel euphoric – and mild horror, say researchers, can also help foster lasting psychological resiliencePalms sweat, heartbeat quickens, muscles tense.

item.title: ISRO plans Sun and Moon missions in 2023 as well as commercial ones
item.description: ISRO plans Sun and Moon missions in 2023 as well as commercial ones According to ISRO, the spacecraft will be placed in a halo orbit around the first Lagrange point, L1, of the Sun-Earth system.

item.title: World's driest desert Atacama is blooming following heavy rains
item.description: World’s driest desert Atacama is blooming following heavy rains Atacama desert, located along the western coast of South America's cone and stretches for about 1,600 kms.
